main event: The UFO sighting report describes a tear drop-shaped, light greenish object with a smoky trail falling into the ocean, potentially resembling a meteor.
interesting points: The object was described as light greenish with a smoky trail, typical of a meteor, and faded out gradually into the ocean.
The report suggests that the characteristics and duration of the sighting are typical of a meteor, and the conclusion was that it was possibly a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical meteor.
The object appeared to be in downward flight and then faded out with added brightness just before going out of sight.
The observation was made by the USS SKYWATCHER picket ship, providing credibility to the sighting.
The report includes detailed information about the weather conditions, altitude, and considerable air traffic in the area at the time of the sighting.
result: Possibly a meteor or astronomical event
sighted object: Tear drop-shaped, light greenish object with a smoky trail
witnesses: USS SKYWATCHER picket ship crew members
